title: Kiki Smith Tattoo Book - similar to Runic {Jan}
content:
This is a book for Steuban Glass showcasing glassware by Kiki Smith, designed by Abbott Miller and John Kudos at Pentagram. I'm trying to identify the typeface used for the title "TATTOO" or something similar to it. Thanks!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100226141636im_/http:/typophile.com/files/2_5783.jpg)
author: lanniard

comments.content:
Is there a wider version of Runic or is this just streched horizontally?

[http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/runic-mt/](http://web.archive.org/web/20100226141636/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/runic-mt/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/adobe/runic-mt/")
I don't believe that it is stretched
